data.title: Archer Names Two New Partners
data.meta_description:
Archer & Greiner is proud to announce Nicholas L. DePaolo and Trevor A. Prince, Jr. have been named partners of the firm, effective April 22, 2024.
“We are thrilled to welcome these talented lawyers…
data.meta_site_name: Archer & Greiner, P.C. - Archer Names Two New Partners
data.text:
Archer & Greiner is proud to announce Nicholas L. DePaolo and Trevor A. Prince, Jr. have been named partners of the firm, effective April 22, 2024.

“We are thrilled to welcome these talented lawyers to the firm’s partnership,” said Christopher Gibson, Archer president. “They have distinguished themselves through their deep command of their area of expertise, a commitment to unsurpassed client service, and a dedication to our firm’s values and culture, and we look forward to their continued success.”

Congratulations to Trevor and Nicholas on reaching this significant career milestone.

Nicholas DePaolo joined the firm in 2021 and is a member of Archer’s Real Estate Group. Nick counsels a diverse group of clients, including national and international companies, government entities, and private developers, investors, and lenders in all stages of commercial real estate acquisitions, sales, and financing transactions. He also works with landlords and tenants in the negotiation of a wide range of commercial leases, including office, retail, warehouse, and industrial leasing, and represents clients in the negotiation of redevelopment and financial agreements with respect to redevelopment projects.

Earlier in his career, Nicholas served as a Deputy Attorney General in the Division of Law of the New Jersey Office of the Attorney General. Following law school, Nicholas served as a judicial clerk for the Honorable James. W. Palmer, Jr., J.S.C., in the Law Division of the Superior Court of New Jersey in Ocean County, NJ.

He received his JD from Rutgers University Law School and his BA from Stockton University.

Trevor Prince, Jr. joined the firm in 2021 and is a member of Archer’s Business Litigation Group. A seasoned litigator, Trevor focuses on complex commercial and civil litigation and represents companies, C-suite executives, and high-net-worth individuals across a broad array of industries throughout the country, including the financial services sector. In his diverse practice, he handles a broad range of matters, including shareholder and partnership disputes, breach of contract, breach of fiduciary duty and other business torts, real estate, construction, education, sports, insurance, telecommunications, labor and employment, products liability, automotive, healthcare, civil rights, and religious institutions.

Trevor also represents clients in construction law in litigation, ADR, and transactional matters involving commercial, governmental and residential projects, including transportation and infrastructure projects, office buildings, shopping malls, convention centers and schools.

He received his JD from New York Law School and his BA from Howard University.

About Archer

For over 95 years, Archer & Greiner has been providing full-service litigation and transactional legal services to clients ranging from Fortune 100 corporations and small and middle-market companies, to closely-held and family-owned businesses. Our 175 attorneys span nine offices serving clients’ interests across a wide range of industries. As a full-service firm, we draw on the strength of all our practices and multidisciplinary teams. This collaboration ensures that our clients receive complete, coordinated and comprehensive counsel in every area of the law that impacts their businesses.
